title: Fuzzy Search should be configurable in how many terms are expanded
description: Fuzzy search gets expanded to a limit of up to a 50 term boolean query. If your field has more than 50 terms within the edit distance, some will be rejected as terms to search for and thus not be found. This should be configurable via local param syntax. The default is currently hardcoded at 50 and instantiated at that number in FuzzyQuery.
